title: Raging Knights Esports Recruiting now for League of Legends Team.
body:
Hello gamers... Raging Knights is a brand new organisation and are looking for gamers to join our League of legends Team.

[b]Our Vision 
- To start a tight knit team that enjoy gaming together
- To slowly move on to onto the LANS and into ESPORTS
- To be a professional team

Your Values
- Be able to follow a strict roster
- To be able to meet gaming times (on time!)
- To be able top commit to team training
- Able to perform under pressure
- Committed to our vison
- Able to banter with team

What We Offer
- Full game tournaments
- Fees paid for by us
- Servers to practice on
- Fully developed website
- Possible transport to LAN sponsored
- Possible gaming gear sponsored

*We have connections with Logitech that will help achieve our future vision*

* Platinum 2 and above
* Looking for  Full team  Not including me.

STRICTLY NO TROLLS OR HACKERS


We are looking for 5 members and one sub. 

If the above sounds like you, please leave your ego at the door and lets game! 

Contact Us on steam http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198017843870/
http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198058834600/ or 
https://discord.gg/K6j9GfP
